actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on Water and Power. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 98-224 Pt. 4.

official_title: A bill to extend the service area for the San Luis Unit of the Central Valley Project, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Extends the service area for the San Luis unit of the Central Valley (water irrigation) project, California, to include the Pleasant Valley Water District in Fresno County, California. Provides financing for the inclusion of such district in the project.

titles.title: A bill to extend the service area for the San Luis Unit of the Central Valley Project, and for other purposes.
